alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Monroe and northern Lamar Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 329 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Liberty Hill, or near Barnesville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Milner, Aldora, Liberty Hill, Goggins, Johnstonville and Chappel Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
